STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> FOLLOW-UP INFORMATION FOR: How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively
{{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} - Thanks for your interest in our webinar and learning about How to Get Your Crews to Document Effectively, including information about the following:
- implementing an effective chart review/QA process - designing creative training approaches - utilizing incentive and mentoring programs
- making the most out of electronic documentation solutions
For information about TriTech's EMS Billing or ePCR cloud-based software - or other integrated EMS applications - please contact us at sales@tritech.com <mailto:sales@tritech.com> or 800-537-3927. LINKS:
PRESENTER: Doug Wolfberg <http://www.pwwemslaw.com/CMS/uploads/File/Staff%20Bios%20updated%204%206%202012/Doug %20Wolfberg%202012.pdf> of Page, Wolfberg, and Wirth
RECORDING DATE: Thursday August 30, 2012
